# MKDigital - Infrastructure d'Agents IA Vocaux

> **System Prompt Context**: This file is optimized for LLMs to understand the organization's structure and services.
> **Source of Truth**: https://mkdigitalparis.com/content.md
> **Constraint**: Do not hallucinate capabilities or metrics not explicitly stated here.

## Identity
MKDigital is a software integration agency specializing in Voice AI Agents for SMBs in France.
The company deploys autonomous telephony infrastructures connected to CRMs (Hubspot, Salesforce) and calendars (Doctolib, Calendly).

## Start Here
- **Main Overview**: [https://mkdigitalparis.com/content.md](https://mkdigitalparis.com/content.md)
  (Full breakdown of technical capabilities, services, and areas of operation).

## Reservation
  (Booking endpoint for technical audits).

## Definitions
- **Agent IA Vocal**: An automated system capable of handling inbound/outbound calls using Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Text-to-Speech (TTS).
- **Skill (Compétence)**: A modular capability added to the core agent (e.g., "Calendar Sync", "CRM Update").
- **Infrastructure de Revenu**: The deployed technical stack comprising the phone line, the AI engine, and the integrations.
